2064.subject: HPWE
2064.descrlong: Introduces the history, debates, and definitions regarding the interdisciplinary degree in Human Performance and Wellness. Explores research skills needed to complete Senior Capstone project. Develops a learning plan that integrates the HPWE concentration, Capstone interests, and personal and professional goals.  (Fall and Spring semesters.)
